item.title: Distributed Application Runtime (Dapr) v1.10 Released
item.description: Recently, the Dapr maintainers released V1.10 of Distributed Application Runtime (Dapr), a developer framework for building cloud-native applications, making it easier to run multiple microservices on Kubernetes and interact with external state stores/databases, secret stores, pub/sub-brokers, and other cloud services and self-hosted solutions.
item.author:
(Steef-Jan Wiggers
Cloud Queue Lead EditorFollow)
